channel.title: app-in-a-day on BarCamp Cork
channel.description: Recent content in app-in-a-day on BarCamp Cork

item.title: "Build A Web-App in a Day" at BarCamp
item.description: A few of us have been bouncing around the idea of building a web application in one day for the past few months. BarCamp seems like the ideal opportunity to try this. From the sign-up comments, it looks like plenty of people are interested in taking part. Unlike the impromptu style of the rest of the day, this one does require quite a bit of up-front preparation if it is to succeed.
